about_the_game:
We have merged card games with the battles of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from various factions, gather your legions, and charge to conquer all your opponents!

Game Features:

  • Strategically Compiled Decks: Choose your cards carefully! Use your gold in each round to acquire new cards, and get to know the different ranks and decks of the nations as you level up. Skillful combinations and synergies strengthen the number and power of your army and secure you victory over your rivals.
  • Distinct Hero Abilities: Each game starts with choosing a hero, whose unique abilities offer a balanced risk-reward scenario in both the early and late phases. By combining different cards with your hero's abilities, you can significantly enhance your forces.
  • Wealth of Nations: Each national army has its own tactics. Master these unique strategies to unleash the full power of the nations and discover various engaging gameplay styles.

Warlords of the Deck has already launched Early Access and offers the following content:

  • Five nations, each with its own unique set of cards.
  • 100+ fully implemented cards
  • 70+ heroes to choose from
  • The campaign mode offers the flexibility to pause the game at any time to make strategic plans without time constraints and allows asynchronous battles with players around the world.
  • In the Arena 1v1 mode, you compete in fast-paced real-time battles against 7 other players, aiming to be the last survivor in a fast-paced elimination fight.
  • Arena 2v2 mode: Team up with a friend, fight side by side, and send each other support in the respective battle to triumph as a team.
